{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Xinyan
|time               = 2022-10-16
|zh                 = 
;今天是辛焱的生日哦，我们快去为她庆祝吧！
:'''旅行者：'''之前听朋友说过，琉璃百合的汁液能够使休眠的古琴回春。
:'''旅行者：'''把它涂在辛焱的琴上，会不会让琴奏出的声音更加特别呢？
:'''辛焱：'''哈哈，好有意思的说法！
:'''辛焱：'''那如果涂上绝云椒椒的汁液，说不定会让演奏更加火热呢！
:'''辛焱：'''我们都试试看吧。
|dialogue_review_zh = 如果涂上绝云椒椒的汁液，说不定会让演奏更加火热呢！
|en                 =
;Today is [[Xinyan]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with her!
:'''Traveler:''' I've heard from a friend before that Glaze Lily juice can revitalize a dormant ''{{w|guqin}}''.
:'''Traveler:''' If we paint it onto Xinyan's guitar, would that make it sound extra special?
:'''Xinyan:''' Haha, that's an interesting idea!
:'''Xinyan:''' Maybe if we paint some Jueyun Chili juice on it, my performances will be even more on fire!
:'''Xinyan:''' Let's try both out.
|dialogue_review_en = Maybe if we paint some Jueyun Chili juice on it, my performances will be even more on fire!
